lines.text: Relax. I'm a scientist. I know what I'm doing.
I'm dying.
You are not going to die! I've got the stuff, I just need a syringe!
It's going to be terrible. You've got to leave!
There's nowhere left to go.
Joanie, did they hurt you? It's all my fault... you were right! Protocol 1! We're all dying Joanie, except you.
What happened Mr. Schmidt, what went wrong?
[guiltily looks away]
Hello! I can see you! Get on down here!
What the hell is that?
It's me, Dr. Nielsen!
I... WARNED... YOU!
Well, you've got the safe-suit on, get on down here!
It's different for you! Germs are your job!
I Feel rage,BEAUTIFUL RAGE!
We're all crazy now, the whole world... he was part of it Cal, so was I!
Yeah but he knew about it and you didn't... I guess sometimes when people see a problem they've just got to solve it.
Yeah.
You're pregnant, Joanie. Congratulations.
What do you think I am, a lab animal, gonna foam at the mouth? Get over here!

[drunkenly]
I don't need a ride home sheriff, I'm already here!
Joanie, listen to me, you don't have to say a word, just show me your daybook!

[holds up burned paper]
Here it is! You stupid cow, you burned the page but you remember the numbers, don't you?
I'm not telling you anything!
Joanie, we don't have time to be nice!
She'll talk.
[Tippett holds Joanie down and holds up a cut lamp cord]
Wait a minute! Wait a minute, this is getting out of hand... NO, NO!
Now I know you're frightened but we all wanna leave, don't we?
[zaps her with the cord]
[screams]
Jesus christ, Tippett!
Just my way of saying please! Look, you're killing us, don't you understand?
[zaps her with the cord again and she screams]
D-44! 8 over 5!
[scrambles against the wall]
[types in code on computer but it reads "CODE EXPIRED. NO NEW CODE. PLEASE STAND BY."]
Aah, aah!
[Schmidt stares at her in regret]

First of all let me apologize, to you, Miss Evans, not only for the, uh, the lateness of the hour, but for the stress and worry that you've all been put through. As you know, BioTek is leading a revolution in agriculture. You've all heard the magic words "genetic engineering". Well, in just a few short years we may have ourselves a whole new kind of farm. Corn that doesn't need fertilizer, cattle that fatten themselves. On the other hand, with any new technologies, there are certain risks! Now earlier today, someone spilled a batch of experimental yeast. No one got hurt, but if we open those doors prematurely, before a proper cleanup can be done, we endanger the herds and crops that you already have.
Hey what's with the men from Glad?
[Glad brand plastic bags]
I assume you're referring to our mobile quarantine package
[Evans is being sealed in a large plastic bubble against her will]
. It's a temporary measure, for her protection and yours.
I hear you've uncovered a new antitoxin. How 'bout we tackle that?
It's over, Nate.
Over? No... look... look how much we've learned!
[Nielsen shoots himself in the head with a gun while Dan Fairchild watches in horror]
They're not criminals, they made a mistake! We can sue 'em, you wanna? Civil law? Corporate negligence? Cold chicken?

[Viewing BioTek from outside on a surveillance camera]
Jeez, look at that guy's hand!
Oh no...

[Inside BioTek]
It's awful bright in here, Ramesh! It hurts my eyes.
That's easily overcome, Sir.
[Ramesh hits fuse box of BioTek with an ax and disables it, making lights shut off]
Joanie, wait... something's up ahead.
I don't think we should go down there...
Why not, Joanie?

[Screams]
Dr. Nielsen!
Very much alive, despite what they told you!
You're sick!
I was, for a moment, but not anymore.
[Nielsen reaches for Schmidt's face]
Hello, Tom! Don't worry, you'll recover just like the rest of us. Here, let me give you a hand! Kapoor is right down this way!
No, don't let them take me, Joanie! DON'T LET THEM!
[hugs Joanie and starts crying]
It's alright Mr. Schmidt, we aren't alone anymore!
Oh, but look at my clothes Joanie, blood all over 'em! Do you think this will wash out?

[nervously]
what's the blood from?
I don't want outsiders coming in here! They mustn't see what's happened! It's very shocking.
Who mustn't see?
Ask Ramesh!
[Ramesh jumps out from behind a pipe on the wall, trying to murder Joanie and Mr. Schmidt with an ax]
I feel rage, Joannie! BEAUTIFUL RAGE!
You worked on this!
[referring to virus]
Hell no, I designed the cure!
You knew about it!
...Well, I knew that they were trying - but I didn't think that they could do it. I should have had more faith in the ingenuity of my fellow man, turns out it's a big success!
[holds up bottle of booze]
You think I need this? Well I don't.
[Fairchild tosses booze bottle into the ditch]
You're right, I'm a technocrat. I allowed myself to be used and I'm as guilty as all the rest of 'em.
I hear you brought the whole shooting match down there but never bothered to speak to me! We had a pump malfunction an hour ago and we fixed it!
Hold on, Schmidt! We're in for the long haul. Protocol 1 has been validated.
[Schmidt collapses against the wall in disbelief]
...Validated?... How many are dead?
